Uses of Class
sound.SoundManager.Sound

  • Packages that use SoundManager.Sound 
    Package Description
    sound
    This package contains classes and methods to easily manipulate and play sounds.

    • Uses of SoundManager.Sound in sound

      Methods in sound that return SoundManager.Sound 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SoundManager.Sound SoundManager.getSound(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream stream)
      Gets the sound given in the Input stream.
      SoundManager.Sound SoundManager.getSound(java.lang.String filename)
      Gets a sound from a file with the given name.
      Methods in sound with parameters of type SoundManager.Sound 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.InputStream SoundManager.play(SoundManager.Sound sound)
      Plays the given sound.
      java.io.InputStream SoundManager.play(SoundManager.Sound sound, AbstractSoundFilter filter, boolean loop)
      Plays the given sound, using the given filter.
      Constructors in sound with parameters of type SoundManager.Sound 
      Constructor and Description
      LoopingByteInputStream(SoundManager.Sound sound)
      Creates a looping byte input stream that plays the sound.
